name: Cyberpunk 2077: Phantom Liberty
mini_description: An open-world, action-adventure RPG set in the dark future of Night City.
full_description: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure RPG set in the megalopolis of Night City, where you play as a cyberpunk mercenary wrapped up in a do-or-die fight for survival. Improved and featuring all-new free additional content!

name: Black Myth: Wukong
mini_description: An action RPG rooted in Chinese mythology based on Journey to the West.
full_description: Black Myth: Wukong is an action RPG rooted in Chinese mythology. You shall set out as the Destined One to venture into the challenges and marvels ahead, to uncover the obscured truth beneath the veil of a glorious legend from the past.

requirements.graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB

name: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree
mini_description: Rise, Tarnished, and let grace guide you to brandish the power of the Elden Ring.
full_description: The Golden Order has been broken. Rise, Tarnished, and let grace guide you to brandish the power of the Elden Ring and become an Elden Lord in the Lands Between.

requirements.processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
requirements.graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
